Text: ...Hell, props to you for collecting them all together, Ichy! E-Man was one of those Charleton books that confused a lot of comics fans when it was cancelled. Everyone knew about the book, claimed they bought it and especially praised Joe Staton's work, but according to the publisher and the distributor(s), it wasn't a profitable book, and newsstand/spinner issues always got returned. Even Joe Staton has never figured it out!
